title: Joe Wilkinson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #152
itunes:title: Joe Wilkinson • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #152
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent writer, comic and podcaster JOE WILKINSON!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the excellent writer, comic and podcaster JOE WILKINSON!


He is so much more than those three simple descriptors of course - you will have seen or heard him on a lot of bits and pieces over the years, certainly in podcast form at the very least. This is a perfect chance to get better acquainted with Joe, as he teams up with Brett for a unique blend of selections and insights, all delivered back on those early heydays of a young lockdown. A goody for you this week folks, you shall enjoy! And be sure to check all relevant Joe links below!


LIVE FILMS TO BE BURIED WITH in London! JULY 3rd! DETAILS HERE!
